person.persName: James B. Mershon (Pendleton County, Kentucky, blacksmith and soldier/18th Kentucky Infantry)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, blacksmith and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to George A. Mershon. Father of Beckett Mershon and Henry C. Mershon. Married to Catherine "Kate" Scott Pendleton Mershon in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in July 1854. Father of Malinda Mershon and Mary E. Mershon. Blacksmith in Washington County in 1850. Blacksmith in Pendleton County in 1860. Served in the 18th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as corporal and sergeant from February 1862 to December 1863.
